column5: Looking into Gullrock for next year. Will my cell phone work while I'm on the lake. I have a Track phone
Gullrock is a great lake. Can get crowded at peak times. lots of boats. Fishing is good though. Your cell phone will work on the lake.....unfortunately. depnding on how you look at it.

You will be able to text from most places on the lake and receive / make calls on many places on the lake. Check your plan, because if Canada isn't covered on it, it will cost you an arm and a leg, but you will have coverage.
